explanation: [0-0] Inside a room, a young boy in a blue shirt is sitting at a table. There are many open workbooks on the table, and a pair of scissors is placed on the left side of the table. The boy is leaning sideways against the wall behind him, holding a mobile phone with both hands. A round clock is hanging on the wall behind him. There is a white line on the wall behind the clock, connecting the mobile phone in the boy's hand. On the left side is a white door.
[0-3] Then the boy puts down the mobile phone in his hand, quickly sits down beside the table, picks up a pen with his right hand and starts to do the exercises.
[0-3] Then the boy puts down the mobile phone in his hand, quickly sits down beside the table, picks up a pen with his right hand and starts to do the exercises.
[0-3] Then the boy puts down the mobile phone in his hand, quickly sits down beside the table, picks up a pen with his right hand and starts to do the exercises.

[3-6] Immediately afterwards, the door opens from the outside, and a young woman stands at the door. She is wearing a denim shirt and a fluorescent green jumpsuit. As the woman pushes the door open, the mobile phone the boy hung on the wall is lifted upwards. Then she walks into the room while looking at the boy. Then she pushes the door open a little more with her right hand, and you can see that the mobile phone on the wall has been lifted up near the clock.

[3-6] Immediately afterwards, the door opens from the outside, and a young woman stands at the door. She is wearing a denim shirt and a fluorescent green jumpsuit. Then she pushes the door open a little more with her right hand, and you can see that the mobile phone on the wall has been lifted up near the clock.

As the woman pushes the door open, the mobile phone the boy hung on the wall is lifted upwards. Then she walks into the room while looking at the boy. Then she pushes the door open a little more with her right hand, and you can see that the mobile phone on the wall has been lifted up near the clock.

[6-15] Then the woman raises her head and sees the mobile phone hanging on the wall. Then the woman picks up the scissors on the table with her right hand, walks to the wall, cuts the connecting wire of the mobile phone hanging on the wall, and then takes the mobile phone off. Then she puts the scissors on the table and closes the door. At the same time, the boy has been looking down and writing seriously.
